formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to add to: must be 'Repository' for this procedure (to add to other locations, use other Add... procedures instead)

formElement.label: CICS Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The CICS configuration associated with the commands that you want to add to the change package

formElement.label: Serialized Repository Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Name-value pairs to set in the resource definition object being created, one per line in NAME=VALUE format. Write each restriction criteria per one line. For example: Command=Add ObjGroup=value ObjType=value ObjName=value. Valid keys are: [Command, ObjGroup, ObjType, ObjName, ObjDefVer, TContainer], specify either 'ObjDefVer' or 'ObjGroup'. 'TContainer' ("target container") is relevant only when packaging an Add command. It identifies the ResGroup to which you want the resource definitions added. Command can be one of [Add, Remove, Delete].

formElement.label: Change Package ID:
formElement.documentation: The ID of the change package to add the command(s) to

formElement.label: Container Type:
formElement.documentation: Container type to add the command(s) to: must be 'Change Package' for this procedure (to add to other container types, use other Add... procedures instead)
